thread.title: Forex focus: never mind Greece - we should worry about China
thread.title_full: Forex focus: never mind Greece - we should worry about China

author: Liz Phillips
title: Forex focus: never mind Greece - we should worry about China
text: Expat Money Forex focus: never mind Greece – we should worry about China With all eyes focused on the possibility of a Grexit, experts advise how best to protect against the effects – and argue that China should be a bigger concern An investor works at a terminal near a board showing stock market movements at a securities company in Beijing on July 10. Chinese stocks closed higher in recent days after a government rescue plan offered a respite from a month-long rout, but analysts warned of further uncertainty and volatility Photo: GREG BAKER/AFP/Getty Images
